description: Shonda Rhimes Leaves ABC For Netflix!
maintext: Shonda Rhimes has moved on! The brilliant producer will start a new gig with Netflix creating content that will blow us all away. For now, all of the TGIT shows will remain in tack. “Scandal” is the only show to announce their final season, but will this spark a near-ending for other shows “HTGAWM” and “Grey’s Anatomy?”
title: [Listen] Shonda Rhimes Leaves ABC For Netflix
